english: Drinking and gambling sank him completely .
chinese: 饮酒和赌博使他彻底堕落了。

english: The mayor decried gambling in all its forms .
chinese: 市长谴责各式各样的赌博。

english: She held pronounced opinions on gambling .
chinese: 她对赌博有强烈的意见。
是谁的形象把赌博神圣化了？

english: To recover his losses , he gambled again .

chinese: 赌博造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The mayor blew the whistle on gambling .
chinese: 市长下令开始取缔赌博。

english: He was known to have gambled freely .
chinese: 据说他还大手大脚地赌博。

english: We 'll never give the green light to gambling ..
chinese: 我们永远不会给赌博开绿灯。

english: He gambled away all his fortune .
chinese: 他赌博输掉了全部财产。

english: His downfall was caused by gambling and drink .
chinese: 他的身败名裂是由赌博和酗酒造成的。

english: He has a passion for gambling .
The reformers thundered against drinking and gambling .
chinese: 社会改革者大声疾呼，反对酗酒和赌博。

english: He had only the tendency to that diffusive form of gambling .
chinese: 他有的是一种逢场作戏的赌博方式。
